Title: The Living and the Dead
Plot: With the fate of the world in their hands, Pete and Myka's only hope of finding a cure to the Sweating Sickness is a drunken history professor. Meanwhile, Steve and Claudia enter Artie's subconscious in an attempt to bring him out of his coma before he fades away for good.
GuestStars: Polly Walker, James Marsters, Roger Rees, Kate Mulgrew, Thomas Roberts, Lindsay Wagner, CCH Pounder, Genelle Williams
